product_name: Mavic Cosmic Carbone 40 C Elite Wheelset with Tires
long_description: Weighing in at a featherweight 2,085g, the Mavic Cosmic Carbone 40 Wheelset with Tires help you reach maximum speed with light weight and a durable carbon-fiber layup with aluminum spine.
short_description: Weighing in at a featherweight 2,085g, the Mavic Cosmic Carbone 40 Wheelset with Tires help you reach maximum speed with light weight and a durable carbon-fiber layup with aluminum spine.
